mean_cn: n.公司；团体组织；编入，合并
mean_en: the act of creating a legally recognized company; the act of including something so that it forms part of something; something that has been included in this way
sentence: The incorporation of a garden will raise the price of the house.
sentence_trans: 把一个花园并入这栋房子会提高房子的价格。
word_etyma: in向内，进入 ＋ corpor团体 ＋ ation名词后缀 → 合并 → incorporation结合而成的组织、团体、公司
